participant_1.background:
I'm not into superheroes, but I love to capture the beauty of the rain and my cats.
I love spending time with my dog, we go for walks, play fetch, and cuddle.
i do not celebrate any holidays.
i like the tv show the walking dead.
I drink my coffee and head to work, worried about my brother who is always getting into trouble.

content.text: What's up?
I'm doing well! Just finished watching an episode of The Repair Shop.
I've never seen that one, what's it about?
It's a show where people bring in old items to be repaired by a team of experts. It's really interesting to see how they restore items to their former glory.
That sounds cool! I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's on Netflix.
What are some of your other hobbies?
I love watching football, playing video games, and spending time with my family.
I love football too! What's your favorite team?
I'm a big fan of the Eagles.
Nice! I'm a fan of the Giants.
We'll have to see who comes out on top this year!
Definitely!
What kind of video games do you play?
I mostly play open world RPGs, like Skyrim and The Witcher.
I love those games too! I've been playing a lot of Skyrim lately.
Nice! I've been thinking about starting a new playthrough.
You should! It's always fun to start a new character and explore the world again.
I will!
Cool! I'm sure you'll have a lot of fun.
